values.value: {"steps":[{"name":"Operator Information","stepNumber":1,"fields":[{"name":"operatorName","type":"text","label":"Operator Name","required":true},{"name":"operatorAddress","type":"text","label":"Address","required":true},{"name":"operatorPhone","type":"tel","label":"Phone","required":true},{"name":"operatorEmail","type":"email","label":"Email","required":true},{"name":"operatorCode","type":"text","label":"Operator Code","required":false}]},{"name":"Lease & Location","stepNumber":2,"fields":[{"name":"leaseNumber","type":"text","label":"Lease Number","required":true},{"name":"meridian","type":"text","label":"Meridian","required":false},{"name":"township","type":"text","label":"Township","required":false},{"name":"range","type":"text","label":"Range","required":false},{"name":"section","type":"text","label":"Section","required":false},{"name":"legalDescription","type":"textarea","label":"Legal Description (PLSS)","required":true},{"name":"latitude","type":"number","label":"Latitude","required":true},{"name":"longitude","type":"number","label":"Longitude","required":true},{"name":"county","type":"text","label":"County","required":false},{"name":"state","type":"text","label":"State","required":true}]},{"name":"Well Information","stepNumber":3,"fields":[{"name":"wellName","type":"text","label":"Well Name","required":true},{"name":"apiNumber","type":"text","label":"API Number","required":false},{"name":"wellType","type":"picklist","label":"Well Type","required":true,"options":["Oil","Gas","Oil & Gas","Injection","Disposal","Observation","Water Supply","Geothermal","CBM"]},{"name":"totalDepth","type":"number","label":"Proposed MD (ft)","required":true}]},{"name":"Drilling Program","required":true},{"name":"mudProgram","type":"textarea","label":"Mud Program","required":true},{"name":"blowoutPreventionEquipment","type":"textarea","label":"BOP Program","required":true},{"name":"expectedFormationPressures","type":"textarea","label":"Expected Formation Pressures","required":false},{"name":"expectedFreshwaterZones","type":"textarea","label":"Expected Freshwater Zones","required":false},{"name":"expectedLostCirculationZones","type":"textarea","label":"Expected Lost Circulation Zones","required":false}]},{"name":"SUPO","stepNumber":5,"fields":[{"name":"wellPadLayout","type":"textarea","label":"Well Pad Layout","required":false},{"name":"accessRoads","type":"textarea","label":"Access Roads","required":false},{"name":"reclamationPlan","type":"textarea","label":"Reclamation Plan","required":true},{"name":"waterSourceDetails","type":"textarea","label":"Water Source","required":true}]},{"name":"Supporting","stepNumber":6,"fields":[{"name":"bondingType","type":"text","label":"Bond Required?","required":false}]},{"name":"Documents","stepNumber":7,"fields":[]},{"name":"Review & Submit","stepNumber":8,"fields":[{"name":"priorityLevel","type":"picklist","label":"Priority","required":false,"options":["Standard","Expedited","Emergency"]},{"name":"expectedSpudDate","type":"date","label":"Expected
